articles.title: Kids are going without dental care during the pandemic
articles.description: Children are missing out on preventative dental care during the pandemic, according to a new survey. Some 40% of parents have avoided seeking care at all, citing concerns about infection, office closures and cost.
articles.content:
(CNN)Children are missing out on preventative dental care including teeth cleaning and checkups during the pandemic, according to a new survey.
